issue.title: [C++] Build fails with TLS error on parquet-cpp clone
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2204](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2204). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```java

Cloning into 'parquet-cpp'...
error: error:1407742E:SSL routines:SSL23_GET_SERVER_HELLO:tlsv1 alert protocol version while accessing https://github.com/apache/parquet-cpp.git/info/refs?service=git-upload-pack
fatal: HTTP request failed
The command '/bin/sh -c git clone https://github.com/apache/parquet-cpp.git' returned a non-zero code: 128
```
